title: What is the use of both a zero article and definite article (articles, English)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Generalization: zero article, plural for count nouns. Caffeine is yummy. Gold is valuable. Birds have feathers. Dogs are good at smelling. It means all, in general, as a rule. Definite: The coffee I made was delicious. The gold in those hills is valuable. The bird that came in my house was terrifying. The dogs I saw were beautiful. It means a specific one that either we both already know (please feed the dog) or that I have defined in context to make it specific. (singular, plural or non-count).
